text:
MOHAMMAD IMRAN  
 Mobile:  +91-8390810990 Email : imran_jamsheed@yahoo.co.in  
 
 
Synopsis:  
Dynamic professional with 8+  years of e xperience in Project h andling, Mechanical maintenance 
activities, Inspection , Quality analysis & Quality c ontrol. Effective communic ator  with good 
relationship management & negotiation skills; had the opportunity to handle staff with different 
nationalities and of all ages; can be trusted to work unsupervised, meet deadlines and develop 
creative ideas;  possess a flexible & result orie nted attitude with analytical skills. An ambitious 
professional with significant ability to learn new concepts and effectively use them, and has an 
ability to work with team.  
 
Educational Qualification : 
 
 B.E. Mechanical  from Nagpur University in 2005  with 65.6%  marks.  
 H.S.S.C  from Maharashtra State Board of Secondary & Highe r Secondary Education, Pune.  
(Divisional Board, Nagpur) in 2000 with 75.5%  marks.   
 S.S.C  from Maharashtra State Board of Secondary & Higher  Secondary Education, Pune.  
(Divisional Board, Nagpur) in 1998 with 75.73%  marks.  
 
Additional Qualification:  
 
 MBA Operation Management from Sikkim Manipal University with  65.02% marks.  
 Masters Certificate  in Project Planning &  Management  from  CADD Mastre Institute  
Nagpur . (Software learned  Primavera P6  + MS Project 2010 ) 
 Masters Certificate in Computer Aided Engineering ” from Central Institute of Tool Design , 
Hyderabad  with 76%  marks.  
 Certificate Course in Computer Operation from Maharashtra State Board of Vocational 
Examination with 65%  marks.  
 
 
Organi zational Experience:  
 
 M.E.W DOHA EAST POWER STATION & WATER DISTILLATION PLANT, KUWAIT  
 
Well experienced in handling various projects at Doha East Power Station and Water Distillation 
Plant, Kuwait.  
 
EMPLOYEE   :  Kharafi National KSC (Closed) , Kuwait.  
POSI TION    :  Mechanical Engineer  
TENURE    :   May 2010 till March  2015  
 
 Scheduling the work activities for Shut down along with generation of work packages.  
 Co-ordinating with sub -contractors during preparatory activities for shut down.  
 Inspection and mainten ance of underground service water & fire fighting pipelines.  
 Inspection and maintenance of equipment drainage system and storm drainage system.  
 Installation of rooftop water tanks of 500, 1000 & 2000 Gallons.   Updating daily activities/progress, expediting the causes of delay and implementing 
counter measures.  
 Evaluating the Scope of work and manpower to be deployed during the various stages of 
activities.  
 Preparation of Work Methodology the Execution Statement and QA/QC 
Procedures adopted during various sta ges of Project.  
 Rate analyses on manpower involved for mobilization preparation for 
shutdown, during shutdown & demobilization.  
 Co-ordination with concerned suppliers, Sub Contractors in preparation of 
Technical and Commercial Proposal.  
 Performing site vis it / site survey for the actual quantum of work involved.  
 Preparation of detail Costing and Estimation for individual activities.  
 Preparation of detailed Bar Chart for the Proposed Project along with 
Manpower Histogram.  
 Preparation of RFM in conjunction wi th Budget, review of quotations forwarded 
by MEW Purchase & Imports Department in response to RFQ, clarifications with 
suppliers to meet the specification, RFP recommendation for purchase and 
inspection upon arrival.  
 
 
EMPLOYEE  : 3B General Trading & Cont . Est.  Kuwait.  
POSITION   : Operation  Engineer  
TENURE   :  Feb  2008 till May 2010  
 
 Inspection and maintenance of underground service water and fire fighting pipelines.  
 Inspection & maintenance of underground drainage system for all equipment drains and 
storm drainage system.  
 Preparation of Mechanical & Civil drawings based on actual data taken on site & with 
reference of old existing drawings. (Software used : Autocad)  
 Planning and follow -up of Preventive maintenance and Shut down  Maintenance of BFW 
Pumps, Service water Pumps, Make -up water Pumps, Air Compressors Gas Scrubbers 
and Heat Exchangers for HFO.  
 Routine Checks and Inspection of Auxiliaries like Fuel Oil Pumps, Gas scrubbers, Heat 
Exchangers for HFO, Air Compressors, Service water and Make – up wat er Pumps.  
 Budget preparation consisting of moving & non -moving spares, consumables 
and new items required.  
 Preparation of RFM in conjunction with Budget, review of quotations forwarded 
by MEW Purchase & Imports Dep artment  in response to RFQ, clarification s with 
suppliers to meet the specification, RFP recommendation for purchase and 
inspection upon arrival.  
 Inspection, Recording & Quality Assurance of all Rehabilitation activities during 
initial & final stage inspection of equipment.  
 Preparation of Safety plan, identification of potentially hazardous part of the 
work &  safety precaution required in areas such as Gas/Oil line.  
 Preparing Quality plan, Quality manual, maintenance reports & Inspection 
procedure .  BEST SOFTWARE ENGINEERS (P) LTD. HYDERABAD  
 
EMPL OYEE  : Best Software Engineers (P) Ltd. Hyderabad  
POSITION   : CAD  Engineer  
TENURE   :  April 2007 till September  2007 
 
 Conversion of Mechanical, Electrical & Civil drawings with reference of old 
existing drawings. (Software used : Autocad)  
 Responsible for  providing software training and technical support to staff 
working on different projects.  
 
 
 
 ADCC INFOCAD (P) LTD. NAGPUR  
 
EMPLOYEE  : ADCC Infocad (P) Ltd. Nagpur  
POSITION   : Trainee  Engineer  
TENURE   :  June 2006 till March 2007  
 
Key Projects Handled:  
 
Title    : Rourkela Steel Plant Project   
Organization  : Rourkela Steel Plant  
Duration   : September 2006 to November 2006  
Aim    : Conversion of Mechanical and Structural Drawings.  
Details    : Undertaken project of RSP for the digitisation  as well as QA &  QC of converted  
  Mechanical Drawings from detail sheets.  
 
Title    : Reliance Energy Project    
Organization  : Reliance Energy  
Duration   : December 2006 to February 2007  
Aim    : Creation of Land Base Data of Cable Network across v arious sub stations and  
      receiving stations in Mumbai City.  
Details    : Undertaken project of Reliance Energy for the constructi on as well as QA & QC  
of the land base data of 22kv and 33kv cables of Mumbai city from the Maps     
provided by Reliance Energy.  
 
Title    : Creat ion of Land Base Data  
Organization  : Gulf Computers at Abu Dhabi, UAE  
Duration   : June 2006 to August 2006  
Detail    : Project undertaken for the construction as well as QA & QC of the land base  
data  from the maps provided by Abu Dhabi Municipal Corporati on. (Worked at 
the client site Abu Dhabi, UAE)  
 
Title    : NICCO Industries Ltd Project .  
Organization  : NICCO Industries Ltd . 
Duration   : December 2006  
Detail    : Project undertaken for preparing models of Bonnet Cas ting and Valve Actuation 
      System ( Assembly model) using Pro -E Software from the detail sheet of the   
      component of the casting and assembly provided by the client.  
 
 Title    : NIPPON Denro ISPAT Ltd.   
Organization  : NIPPON Denro ISPAT Ltd.  
Duration   : February 2007 to March 2007  
Aim    : Conversion of Structural Drawing of Electric Arc Furnace in to AutoCAD  
  Drawing.  
Detail    : Project undertaken for conversion of the Structural drawi ng from the detail  
  sheets  provided by the client.  
 
 
Industrial Training:  
 
Title    : Vocational Trai ning   
Organization  : Bokaro Steel Plant, Bokaro.  
Duration   : 2 weeks  
Details    : Training related to the product cycle i.e. from raw materi al to final product. The 
       procedures need to be carried out for the smooth flow of work and maintaining 
       good production within time limit.  
 
 
Seminar Attended:  
 
 Attended seminar on “Power Plant Familiarization”  organized by National Power 
Training Institute  {NPTI}  Nagpur.  
 Participated in a programme on “NSS Training Programme on Disaster Management”  
organized  under National Services Scheme , Nagpur University.  
 Attended workshop on Positive Personality  & won f irst prize in Socialization, Rapid 
Reading and Speech Modulation  at Confidence Foundation Nagpur.  
 
 
Personal Vitae : 
 
Date of birth    : 25th December 1982  
Nationality     : Indian  
Languages known   : English, Hindi, Urdu, Arabic, Marathi.  
Permanent Address  : NL -28 Naimuddin Street , Waris Pura, Kamptee, Dist. Nagpu r-441002   
Maharashtra  State . India.  
Passport Number     : N1988823  Expires  on 27/0 8/2025 
Driving L icense   : Kuwaiti Driving License 282122505013 (expires on 19/10/2021)  
 
 
 
Declaration:  
 
I do hereby declare that the infor mation provided above is true and correct to best of my

                  (Mohammad Imran)
